Title: Relates to strategic lawsuits against public participation and makes technical corrections
Summary: Relates to strategic lawsuits against public participation; makes technical corrections; relates to the applicability of chapter 250 of the laws of 2020 amending the civil rights law relating to actions involving public petition and participation.
LawCode: Amd §§70-a, 76-a & 71, Civ Rts L; amd §4, Chap 250 of 2020
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to strategic lawsuits against public participation and to make technical corrections; and to amend chapter 250 of the laws of 2020 amending the civil rights law relating to actions involving public petition and participation, in relation to the application thereof
